mapper.select:
select a.id,a.username name,a.password,a.email,a.sex,a.qq,a.weixin,date_format(a.regtime,'%Y-%m-%d') regtime,a.enable,a.filepath from t_sys_user a
a.username like '%${name}%'
order by a.username
mapper.delete: delete from t_sys_user where id in (${ids})
delete from t_sys_user_role where userid in (${ids})
mapper.select: select t.id,t.username name,t.password,t.email,t.sex,t.qq,t.weixin,t.regtime,t.enable,t.filepath from t_sys_user t where t.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update t_sys_user t set t.password=#{pwd} where t.id=#{id} and t.password=#{oldpwd}
mapper.select: select b.name from t_sys_user_role t left join t_sys_user a on t.userid=a.id left join t_sys_role b on t.roleid=b.id where a.username=#{0}

select d.permision from t_sys_perm_role a left join t_sys_user_role b on a.roleid=b.roleid left join t_sys_user c on b.userid=c.id left join t_sys_permission d on a.perid=d.perid where c.username=#{0}
select a.id,a.username as name,a.password,a.email,a.qq,a.weixin,a.state from t_sys_user a where a.username=#{0}
mapper.update: update t_sys_user t set t.state=#{0} where t.username=#{1}

update t_sys_user t set t.state=#{newstate}
t.state=#{oldstate}
